gmailSection.cta: Ready to protect your privacy? Generate your free temporary Gmail address now and experience secure, spam-free sign-ups across all platforms.

home.whatIsText: A disposable email address is a free temporary email service that creates a short-term inbox for receiving emails. Often called tempmail, 10minmail, throwaway email, or burner mail, it helps you avoid spam and protect your primary email. Instead of exposing your real email accounts, you can rely on Fire Temp Mail to keep your personal inbox safe, private, and spam-free.
home.guidesSubtitle: Learn how to use temporary email for popular platforms and protect your privacy

discordGuide.title: Discord Temp Mail
discordGuide.description: Create Discord accounts without exposing your personal email. Complete verification guide.

tiktokGuide.title: TikTok Temporary Email

home.techTitle: The Technology Behind Disposable Email Addresses
home.techIntro: In today's digital world, email addresses have become our online passports‚Äîessential for work communication, business connections, social interactions, and accessing services. Nearly all applications and online services require an email address for registration, as do loyalty programs, contests, and special offers.
home.deasText: Disposable Email Addresses (DEAs) provide an innovative solution for maintaining online privacy while accessing digital services. These temporary addresses allow you to:

deasFeatures.register: Register for services without revealing your primary email
deasFeatures.protect: Protect your identity from data breaches and spam lists
deasFeatures.control: Maintain control over your digital footprint
deasFeatures.expire: Automatically expire after a set period

home.deasCompromise: When a disposable address is compromised or begins receiving unwanted emails, you can simply retire it without affecting your primary communication channels.
home.usesTitle: Practical Uses for Temporary Email Addresses

trials.title: Extended Free Trials
trials.text: Many streaming services like Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime offer limited-time trials. With disposable emails, you can extend your trial periods while maintaining access to these services.

retail.title: Retail Offers Without Spam
retail.text: Stores frequently request email addresses for special offers, which often leads to promotional spam. Temporary emails let you access these benefits without cluttering your primary inbox.

testing.title: Application Testing
testing.text: Developers can create multiple test accounts using disposable emails to thoroughly evaluate their applications before public release.

multiple.title: Multiple Account Management
multiple.text: When services require separate accounts for different purposes (like managing multiple social media profiles), disposable emails provide the necessary separation without creating permanent new accounts.

spam.title: Spam Prevention
spam.text: Using temporary emails for forums, discussion groups, and web forms significantly reduces spam in your primary inbox.

home.choosingTitle: Choosing the Right Disposable Email Service
home.choosingText: The best temporary email providers offer:

choosingFeatures.instant: Instant email generation with one click
choosingFeatures.privacy: No registration or personal information collection

home.effectiveTitle: How to Use Disposable Email Addresses Effectively
home.effectiveText: While some users create secondary accounts with traditional providers like Gmail, this approach requires managing multiple inboxes. Professional disposable email services like Fire Temp Mail offer a more efficient solution by providing temporary addresses that forward to your primary email while maintaining complete separation.
home.effectiveAdvanced: The advanced functionality allows you to filter messages‚Äîsending suspicious emails directly to trash while delivering important communications to your main inbox. If an address becomes compromised, you can simply disable it without affecting your other accounts.
home.conclusionText: Implementing a disposable email system is an effective strategy for participating in online forums, chat rooms, file-sharing services, and bulletin boards while protecting your primary identity. By using temporary addresses from Fire Temp Mail, you ensure your personal information remains secure and your inbox stays free from unwanted spam. Take control of your digital privacy today with our secure, anonymous temporary email service designed to keep your online activities separate from your personal communication channels.

howItWorks.title: üöÄ How Fire Temp Mail Works - Step by Step
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your temporary email in seconds with our simple, no-registration process
howItWorks.step1Text: The moment you visit Fire Temp Mail, we automatically generate a fresh temporary email address for you. No sign-up forms, no personal information required, no waiting‚Äîjust instant access.
howItWorks.step2Text: Click the copy button to save your disposable email address to your clipboard. You can use this email anywhere you need to provide an email address for signups, downloads, or verifications.
howItWorks.step3Text: All emails sent to your temporary address appear in your inbox within seconds. View, read, and forward them as needed. The inbox updates automatically in real-time.
howItWorks.step4Text: Your temporary emails are automatically deleted after 24 hours, leaving no trace. Your privacy is protected by design‚Äîno logs, no tracking, no permanent storage.

gaming.solution: Use Fire Temp Mail for the signup, verify your gaming account, and keep your real email spam-free. Perfect for trying multiple game platforms without commitment.

security.title: üîí How We Protect Your Privacy & Security
security.subtitle: Your anonymity is our top priority. Here's how we keep you safe.

zeroLog.title: Zero Data Logging
zeroLog.text: We don't log IP addresses, track user behavior, or store personal information. Your usage is completely anonymous. We have no way to trace temporary emails back to individual users.

autoDeletion.title: Automatic Deletion
autoDeletion.text: All emails are automatically deleted after 24 hours maximum. No permanent storage means no data breaches. Even if someone wanted to access your old emails, they're already gone.

noRegistration.title: No Registration Required
noRegistration.text: We never ask for your name, email, phone number, or any personal information. Just instant access to temporary email addresses. No account means no data to compromise.

spamFilter.title: Spam & Malware Filtering
spamFilter.text: Basic spam protection filters out malicious emails while allowing legitimate messages through. Suspicious attachments and phishing attempts are automatically blocked.

encryption.title: HTTPS Encryption
encryption.text: All connections to Fire Temp Mail use HTTPS encryption. Your communication with our servers is secure and cannot be intercepted by third parties.

noTracking.title: No Third-Party Tracking
noTracking.text: We don't use intrusive tracking cookies or share data with advertisers. Your browsing remains private while using our service.

limitations.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: What Fire Temp Mail Is NOT For
limitations.subtitle: Be honest with yourself: temporary emails have limitations. Here's what you need to know.
limitations.bankingText: You need permanent access to these accounts. Password resets and security notifications won't reach you if the email is deleted.
limitations.socialMediaText: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn‚Äîuse your real email. You'll need it for account recovery.
limitations.workSchoolText: Important communications need to be permanent and reliable.
limitations.governmentText: Tax filings, benefits, official documents‚Äîthese require permanent email addresses.
limitations.healthcareText: Medical information and appointment reminders are too important for temporary emails.
limitations.ecommerceText: If you plan to make purchases or track orders, use your real email for order confirmations and customer support.
limitations.whyNotText: Temporary emails are deleted automatically after 24 hours. If you need to recover your account, reset your password, or access important notifications later, you won't receive those emails. Use Fire Temp Mail only for non-critical, temporary needs.
limitations.cannotSendText: Fire Temp Mail is receive-only. You can read incoming emails but cannot send replies or compose new messages.
limitations.lifetimeText: Emails are kept for 24 hours maximum. After that, they're permanently deleted with no way to recover them.
limitations.attachmentsText: While we filter malware, we cannot guarantee 100% safety. Don't open suspicious attachments.
limitations.blockedText: Services like PayPal, banks, and some social platforms detect and block temporary email domains.
limitations.noForwardingText: You can view emails in our interface, but cannot automatically forward them to your real email.
limitations.perfectForTitle: ‚úÖ Fire Temp Mail IS Perfect For:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to Fire Temp Mail ("we," "our," or "us"). By accessing or using our website https://firetempmail.com and related services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms of Service ("Terms"). These Terms govern your use of both our free temporary email service ("Free Service") and any enhanced features available under Fire Temp Mail Premium ("Premium Service").

privacy.title: Privacy and Related Policies
privacy.text: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Please review our Privacy Policy to learn how we handle your data. By using our service, you also agree to the terms described in that policy.

serviceDesc.title: Service Description
serviceDesc.text: Fire Temp Mail provides disposable, temporary email addresses for the purpose of protecting your real inbox from spam, newsletters, or unwanted messages. Our Free Service allows you to instantly generate email addresses, receive incoming messages, and discard them at will. The Premium Service provides additional features such as extended email storage, multiple mailboxes, premium domains, and priority support.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.intro: You agree not to use Fire Temp Mail directly or indirectly for any unlawful, abusive, or unauthorized purpose. This includes but is not limited to:
items: Registering important accounts that require permanent or verifiable email access.
Receiving, storing, or sharing sensitive or confidential information.
Sending unsolicited emails, viruses, or malicious code.
Engaging in fraud, harassment, or any activity that violates applicable laws.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Availability
dataStorage.text1: Emails received through Fire Temp Mail are stored temporarily. Free accounts typically store emails for a short duration (usually a few hours), after which messages are automatically deleted. Premium accounts may store emails for a longer period, such as up to one month. Once deleted, emails and domains cannot be restored under any circumstances.
dataStorage.text2: We make no guarantees regarding uptime or uninterrupted availability. Service may be suspended for maintenance, updates, or unforeseen technical issues.

premium.title: Premium Features and Subscriptions
premium.intro: The Premium Service is offered on a subscription basis and may include features such as:
features: Multiple mailboxes for managing several addresses at once.
Exclusive premium domains that are less likely to be blocked.
Extended storage for messages beyond the Free Service limits.
Ad-free experience for a cleaner interface.
premium.billing: Pricing, billing, and subscription terms will be presented at the time of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is disabled prior to the renewal date. You may manage your subscription and cancel auto-renewal at any time in your account settings.

liability.title: Limitations of Liability
liability.intro: Fire Temp Mail is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that:
items: Emails will always be delivered, stored, or accessible.
Domains will remain unchanged or available indefinitely.
Messages will remain unaltered or free from malware.
liability.disclaimer: You agree to hold us harmless from any damages, losses, or claims arising out of your use of the service, including loss of emails or consequences of relying on temporary addresses.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.text: We reserve the right to update or revise these Terms at any time. Material changes will be posted on this page with a revised "last updated" date. Continued use of the service after changes indicates acceptance of the updated Terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.text: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

privacy.metaDescription: Read the comprehensive Privacy Policy of Fire Temp Mail. Learn how we protect your data, handle temporary emails, and manage cookies, logs, and third-party services.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Fire Temp Mail ("we," "our," or "us") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect information when you access https://firetempmail.com and our temporary email services, including both free and premium features.

infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoCollect.intro: We strive to minimize the data we collect. Our service primarily handles:
items: Email content received in your temporary inbox.
Session data such as temporary email addresses, for service functionality.
Technical logs: IP addresses, browser type, ISP, referring/exit pages, platform type, timestamp, and click counts ‚Äî used only in aggregate for security and service maintenance.
For Fire Temp Mail Premium: email addresses and payment information strictly for login, subscription management, and billing.

infoUse.title: How We Use Your Information
infoUse.intro: Collected information is used solely to operate, maintain, and improve our services. This includes:
items: Delivering emails to your temporary inbox.
Preventing abuse and maintaining service security.
Analyzing aggregate usage patterns to enhance service performance.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.text: All temporary emails in free accounts are deleted automatically within 2‚Äì24 hours, depending on system load. Premium accounts may retain emails for up to one month. We do not recover deleted emails or domains once removed.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.intro: We use cookies only to maintain your session and temporary email address during active use. We do not place advertising, analytics, or third-party tracking cookies on free accounts. Cookies may include:
items: Session cookies to keep your temporary email active.
Persistent cookies for Premium users to manage login sessions.
cookies.note: Users can disable cookies in their browser; however, this may affect service functionality.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.text: Fire Temp Mail integrates some third-party services (e.g., payment processors, ad networks, cloud infrastructure). These services may collect non-identifiable information following their own privacy policies. We do not sell or share your personal emails or identifying data with third parties for marketing purposes.

ads.title: Ads and Monetization
ads.text: To support free usage, Fire Temp Mail may display ads served by third-party networks. These networks may use cookies or similar technologies to serve relevant ads. Users can opt out of personalized advertising through ad settings provided by the ad networks.

security.title: Security Measures
security.text: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect temporary emails and system integrity. However, emails are not encrypted end-to-end. Users should avoid storing sensitive information via temporary addresses.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.text: Our services are not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.text: Users may request deletion of Premium account data at any time. For free service users, all data is automatically deleted according to retention policies. Users may contact support for questions or privacy requests.

international.title: International Users
international.text: By using our service, you consent to the transfer of your information to servers located in Morocco or other jurisdictions where we operate, in compliance with applicable privacy laws.

changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Updated policies will be posted on this page with the "effective date" revised. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of these changes.

contact.title: Contact Us

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our secure temporary email service designed to protect your privacy.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: How we protect your data and identity

usage.title: Usage & Features
usage.description: How to use our service effectively

q1.question: What is a temporary email address?
q1.answer:
A temporary email address, also known as a disposable or anonymous email, is a short-term email address that automatically expires after a set period. It allows you to receive emails without revealing your personal email address, protecting your privacy and keeping your primary inbox free from spam.

Temporary email services like Fire Temp Mail provide these addresses instantly without requiring registration, making them ideal for one-time signups, online verifications, and protecting your identity online.

q2.question: Why should I use a temporary email service?
q2.answer:
Using a temporary email service offers several important benefits:

  • Privacy Protection: Keep your personal email address private when signing up for services
  • Spam Prevention: Avoid unwanted promotional emails and newsletters
  • Security Enhancement: Reduce risks from data breaches by using disposable addresses
  • Organization: Create different emails for different purposes (shopping, forums, etc.)
  • Convenience: No registration required and instant access to new email addresses

q3.question: How does Fire Temp Mail protect my privacy?
q3.answer:
Fire Temp Mail employs multiple strategies to ensure your privacy:

  1. We don't require personal information to use our service
  2. All emails are automatically deleted after 2 hours
  3. We use HTTPS encryption for all data transfers
  4. Our service doesn't track your activity across websites
  5. We don't sell or share your data with third parties

For additional security, we recommend not using temporary email for highly sensitive communications.

q4.question: Is Fire Temp Mail completely free to use?
q4.answer:
Yes, our basic temporary email service is completely free with no hidden costs. With our free plan, you can:

  • Create unlimited temporary email addresses
  • Receive emails for up to 24 hours (extendable)
  • View emails in our clean, ad-free interface
  • Use our service without registration

We also offer a premium plan with additional features like sending emails, longer expiration times, and custom domains for users with more advanced needs.

q5.question: How long do temporary emails last?
q5.answer:
By default, Fire Temp Mail addresses remain active for 24 hours. However, you can extend this period:

  1. Basic free addresses: 24 hours (extendable up to 3 times)
  2. Extended addresses: Up to 72 hours with multiple extensions
  3. Premium addresses: Custom durations up to 30 days

After the expiration period, all emails associated with the address are permanently deleted from our servers.

q6.question: Can I send emails from a temporary address?
q6.answer:
Our basic service focuses on receiving emails to protect your privacy. However:

  • Free tier: Receive emails only
  • Premium tier: Send emails from your temporary address
  • All tiers: View and manage received emails through our secure interface

The receiving-only approach for free accounts enhances privacy by preventing misuse of our service for spam activities.

q7.question: What happens to emails after they expire?
q7.answer:
Fire Temp Mail follows a strict data retention policy:

  1. Emails are automatically deleted after the address expires
  2. Expired addresses cannot be recovered
  3. No backups are maintained of deleted content
  4. Our system is designed to permanently erase all data upon expiration

This approach ensures your privacy is protected and that no sensitive information remains on our servers longer than necessary.

q8.question: Can I use temporary email for important accounts?
q8.answer:
While temporary emails are excellent for privacy, we recommend caution:

  • Recommended for: One-time signups, newsletters, forum registrations, and temporary verifications
  • Not recommended for: Banking, government services, primary email accounts, or any service requiring long-term access
  • Consider: The temporary nature means you'll lose access if you need to reset passwords later

For important accounts, we recommend using a permanent email address from a reputable provider.

emailGeneratorPage.lead: Instantly generate a disposable Email Generator address. Keep your real email address private and your inbox clean from unwanted messages and spam.
emailGeneratorPage.seoTitle: Email Generator for Developers & QA Testing
emailGeneratorPage.seoDesc: Professional temporary email generator designed specifically for software developers, QA engineers, and automation testers. Generate unlimited disposable email addresses to test registration flows, email verification systems, password resets, and notification logic‚Äîwithout managing test accounts or cluttering personal inboxes.
emailGeneratorPage.whyTitle: Why Developers Need Disposable Emails for Testing
emailGeneratorPage.whyP1: Testing email-dependent features is essential but painful. You need to verify user registration, email confirmation links, password reset flows, and notification systems‚Äîbut creating dozens of real email accounts is slow, unsustainable, and clutters your inbox.
emailGeneratorPage.whyP2: Fire Temp Mail provides instant, disposable email addresses specifically designed for software testing. Generate unlimited temporary emails to test your app's email workflows without managing test accounts or dealing with email provider restrictions.
emailGeneratorPage.pp1: Creating test Gmail/Outlook accounts manually ‚Üí Generate unlimited emails instantly
emailGeneratorPage.pp2: Managing passwords for multiple test accounts ‚Üí No credentials needed
emailGeneratorPage.pp3: Cleaning up old test data ‚Üí Auto-deletion after 24 hours
emailGeneratorPage.pp4: Email providers blocking automated signups ‚Üí Real domains that work everywhere
emailGeneratorPage.pp5: Testing multi-user scenarios ‚Üí Unlimited unique addresses on demand
emailGeneratorPage.pp6: CI/CD pipelines needing fresh emails ‚Üí Zero-setup generation
emailGeneratorPage.uc1P1: Your app requires email verification during signup. You need to test that verification emails arrive, links work correctly, tokens expire properly, and edge cases are handled.
emailGeneratorPage.uc1P2: Generate temporary email ‚Üí Register in your app ‚Üí Check inbox for verification email (arrives in seconds) ‚Üí Extract verification link/token ‚Üí Complete verification ‚Üí Test edge cases (expired tokens, duplicate verifications).
emailGeneratorPage.uc2P1: Thoroughly test your password reset functionality by generating test accounts with temporary emails, triggering the forgot password flow, receiving reset emails instantly, and verifying token security and expiration logic.
emailGeneratorPage.uc2P2: Valid reset requests, expired tokens, multiple reset attempts, invalid email addresses, rate limiting, and cross-account security.
emailGeneratorPage.uc3P1: Testing apps with different user roles (admin, moderator, user) or multi-tenant systems requires multiple unique email addresses. Generate distinct temporary emails for each test user without the overhead of managing real accounts.
emailGeneratorPage.uc4P1: If your application sends transactional emails (order confirmations, alerts, reminders, status updates), use temporary emails to verify that emails are triggered by correct events, personalization renders properly, HTML/CSS formatting displays correctly, and links work as expected.
emailGeneratorPage.uc5P1: Your CI/CD pipeline runs automated E2E tests that involve email-based workflows. Each test run needs fresh, unique email addresses.
emailGeneratorPage.uc5P2: Generate temporary emails programmatically or use consistent naming patterns to create unique addresses for each test execution without manual intervention. Perfect for Playwright, Cypress, or Selenium test suites.
emailGeneratorPage.uc6P1: Testing integrations with SendGrid, Mailgun, AWS SES, Postmark, or other email service providers requires real recipient addresses to verify successful email delivery, webhook events, bounce handling logic, template rendering, and SPF/DKIM authentication.
emailGeneratorPage.f1: Zero Setup Required: No API keys, no authentication, no account creation. Visit the page, get an email address, start testing.
emailGeneratorPage.f2: Real-Time Email Reception: Emails appear in the inbox within seconds. No polling delays, no batch processing.
emailGeneratorPage.f3: Full Email Access: View complete email content including HTML body, plain text alternative, email headers, sender information, and attachments.
emailGeneratorPage.f4: Custom Aliases for Organization: Use descriptive email addresses that map to specific test cases.
emailGeneratorPage.f5: Automatic Cleanup: Emails auto-delete after 24 hours. No manual cleanup, no credential management, no maintenance overhead.
emailGeneratorPage.securityWarn: Temporary emails are public and insecure. Use them ONLY for development environments, staging/QA with test data, isolated test databases, and integration testing with mock/test APIs.
emailGeneratorPage.securityNever: NEVER use temporary emails for: Production systems, real user data, payment testing (even in sandbox), sensitive information, or production database credentials.
emailGeneratorPage.startP1: Stop wasting time managing test email accounts. Generate unlimited temporary emails instantly and focus on what matters‚Äîbuilding and testing great software. No signup, no cost, no hassle.
emailGeneratorPage.startP2: Frontend developers, backend engineers, QA testers, DevOps engineers, automation specialists, and anyone building email-dependent features.

tempGmailPage.h1: Temp Gmail - Create Temporary Gmail Addresses
tempGmailPage.lead: Instantly generate disposable Gmail addresses that look and function like real Gmail accounts. Protect your personal inbox from spam and unwanted messages.
tempGmailPage.seoTitle1: Gmail's Hidden Privacy Features: Plus-Addressing & The Dot Trick
tempGmailPage.seoP1: Did you know your Gmail account can generate unlimited email addresses without creating new accounts? Gmail has two powerful built-in features that most users don't know about: plus-addressing (aliasing) and the dot trick (period placement). Fire Temp Mail helps you leverage these Gmail-specific features to protect your privacy and organize your inbox.
tempGmailPage.seoP2: These aren't "disposable" emails from a third-party service‚Äîthey're legitimate variations of your actual Gmail address that deliver directly to your existing inbox while letting you track, filter, and organize messages by source.
tempGmailPage.plusP1: Gmail ignores everything after a plus sign (+) in your email address. If your email is john.smith@gmail.com, all of these deliver to the same inbox:
tempGmailPage.whyPlusP1: 1. Track Email Sellers: If you sign up for a service with yourname+serviceX@gmail.com and start receiving spam at that address, you know exactly who sold your email to marketers.
tempGmailPage.whyPlusP2: 2. Automatic Filtering: Create Gmail filters based on the "+" tag to automatically organize emails into folders, apply labels, or even auto-delete spam from specific sources.
tempGmailPage.whyPlusP3: 3. Organize Signups: Use different tags for different categories: +work, +personal, +trials, +shopping. Instantly see what category each email belongs to.
tempGmailPage.whyPlusP4: 4. Bypass "One Email Per Account" Restrictions: Some services (forums, contests, trials) only allow one account per email. Use plus-addressing to create "multiple" addresses.
tempGmailPage.dotTitle: The Gmail Dot Trick: Period Placement Doesn't Matter
tempGmailPage.dotP1: Gmail completely ignores periods (dots) in the username portion of your email address. That means johnsmith@gmail.com, john.smith@gmail.com, j.o.h.n.s.m.i.t.h@gmail.com all deliver to the exact same inbox.
tempGmailPage.dotUseTitle: How to Use the Dot Trick
tempGmailPage.dotUseP1: Multiple Account Signups: If a website only allows one email per person, you can register multiple accounts using different dot placements. The site sees them as different emails, but Gmail sees them all as yours.
tempGmailPage.combineTitle: Combining Plus-Addressing AND the Dot Trick
tempGmailPage.combineP1: For maximum flexibility, combine both features: j.o.h.n.smith+netflix@gmail.com. This creates virtually unlimited unique addresses that all route to your single Gmail inbox while providing maximum tracking and filtering capabilities.
tempGmailPage.breachP1: Let's say you sign up for "ShoppingAppX" using yourname+shoppingappx@gmail.com. Six months later, you receive spam at that exact address. Now you know ShoppingAppX either:
tempGmailPage.breachP2: You can now create a Gmail filter to automatically delete everything sent to yourname+shoppingappx@gmail.com, effectively blocking that source of spam without affecting your other emails.
tempGmailPage.filterTitle: How to Set Up Gmail Filters for Plus-Addressing
tempGmailPage.filterP1: Once you start using plus-addressing, organize incoming emails automatically:
tempGmailPage.filterL1: Open Gmail Settings: Click the gear icon ‚Üí "See all settings"
tempGmailPage.filterL2: Go to "Filters and Blocked Addresses": Click "Create a new filter"
tempGmailPage.filterL3: Add Filter Rule: In the "To" field, enter yourname+shopping@gmail.com
tempGmailPage.filterL4: Choose Action: Apply label "Shopping", skip inbox, mark as read, forward, or delete
tempGmailPage.filterL5: Save Filter: Click "Create filter" and you're done
tempGmailPage.filterP2: Now every email sent to that address automatically gets organized according to your rules.
tempGmailPage.limitP1: While powerful, Gmail's plus-addressing and dot trick have some limitations:
tempGmailPage.limitL1: Not Truly Anonymous: Your base Gmail address is still visible. Anyone can remove the "+tag" to find your actual address.
tempGmailPage.limitL2: Some Sites Block Plus Signs: A few websites reject email addresses containing "+" symbols.
tempGmailPage.limitL3: No Protection from Google: Google still sees all your activity. These tricks don't protect you from Google's data collection.
tempGmailPage.limitL4: Can't Delete Individual Aliases: Unlike true disposable emails, you can't "burn" an alias if it gets compromised.
tempGmailPage.limitL5: Not for High-Risk Signups: Since your real Gmail is still technically exposed, don't use these tricks for untrusted websites. Use Fire Temp Mail instead.
tempGmailPage.vsTitle: When to Use Gmail Tricks vs. Truly Disposable Emails
tempGmailPage.useGmailL1: You want emails delivered to your main inbox
tempGmailPage.useGmailL2: You need to track which services share/sell your email
tempGmailPage.useGmailL3: You want to organize emails from different sources
tempGmailPage.useGmailL4: The service is relatively trustworthy but spammy
tempGmailPage.useGmailL5: You might need long-term access to the account
tempGmailPage.useDispTitle: Use Fire Temp Mail's Fully Disposable Emails When:
tempGmailPage.useDispL1: You need complete anonymity (no link to your real email)
tempGmailPage.useDispL2: Signing up for untrusted or risky websites
tempGmailPage.useDispL3: One-time verifications you'll never need again
tempGmailPage.useDispL4: Testing during development without cluttering your real inbox
tempGmailPage.useDispL5: Services that might spam heavily or sell data aggressively
tempGmailPage.tip1P1: Set up a dedicated filter for all plus-addressed emails:
tempGmailPage.tip1L2: Action: Apply label "Tracked Signups" and skip inbox
tempGmailPage.tip1L3: Result: All plus-addressed emails bypass your main inbox, keeping it clean
tempGmailPage.tip3P1: When you receive spam or phishing emails, check the "To" field. If it shows yourname+specificsite@gmail.com, you've identified the source of the leak or data breach.
tempGmailPage.ctaTitle: Start Using Gmail's Privacy Features Today
tempGmailPage.ctaP1: Gmail's plus-addressing and dot trick are completely free, built-in features that work right now with your existing Gmail account. No signup, no third-party service, no risk. Start protecting your privacy and organizing your inbox by leveraging these powerful Gmail-specific capabilities.
tempGmailPage.ctaP2: For situations requiring full anonymity: Use Fire Temp Mail's truly disposable temporary email addresses on the homepage. For everything else, use Gmail's built-in privacy features explained here.

burnerEmailPage.h1: Free Burner Email Generator ‚Äì Create Disposable Burner Addresses Instantly
burnerEmailPage.lead: Generate anonymous burner email addresses instantly. Perfect for protecting your real identity online ‚Äî no signup, no personal data required.
burnerEmailPage.seoTitle: What Is a Burner Email and Why Do You Need One?
burnerEmailPage.seoP1: A burner email is a disposable, temporary email address that allows you to send or receive messages without revealing your real identity. Unlike a regular email account you may keep for years (like Gmail, Outlook, or Yahoo), a burner email is deliberately short-lived and anonymous ‚Äî designed to be used once (or a few times) and then discarded.
burnerEmailPage.seoP2: The term "burner" comes from "burner phones" ‚Äî prepaid, untraceable phones used for temporary communication. Burner emails work the same way: they create a layer of separation between your real identity and the online world.
burnerEmailPage.howP1: Burner email services like Fire Temp Mail generate a random email address the moment you visit the website. You don't need to create an account, enter personal information, or verify anything. Here's how they work:
burnerEmailPage.howL1: Instant Generation: Visit the website and receive a random, anonymous email address immediately.
burnerEmailPage.howL2: Receive Emails: Use the address to sign up for services, receive verification codes, or accept one-time messages in your temporary inbox.
burnerEmailPage.howL3: No Identity Link: The address has no connection to your real name, phone number, or permanent email.
burnerEmailPage.howL4: Auto-Expiry: After a short period (usually 24 hours), the email address and all associated messages are permanently deleted.
burnerEmailPage.howL5: Unlimited Addresses: Generate as many burner addresses as needed. Each one is completely independent.
burnerEmailPage.usesTitle: Top Use Cases for Burner Emails
burnerEmailPage.use1P: Most websites require an email address to create an account ‚Äî even if you only need temporary access. Burner emails let you register without risking your real inbox being flooded with promotional emails and newsletters.
burnerEmailPage.use2P: Many services offer limited-time free trials but require an email address. Use a burner email to try the service risk-free. If you enjoy it, sign up with your real email later. If not, the burner email simply expires, and you owe nothing.
burnerEmailPage.use3P: Retail websites often require an email for checkout or to unlock first-time purchase discounts. A burner email prevents post-purchase spam while still giving you access to deals, discount codes, and order confirmations.
burnerEmailPage.use4P: Coffee shops, airports, and hotels frequently require an email address to access their Wi-Fi networks. Use a burner email instead of your personal one to avoid marketing campaigns and data harvesting.
burnerEmailPage.use5P: E-books, whitepapers, templates, and other downloadable resources usually sit behind an email gate. Burner emails let you access the content without subscribing to unwanted mailing lists.
burnerEmailPage.use6P: Forums, Reddit-like communities, and discussion boards often require emails to create accounts. Use a burner email to participate anonymously without linking your real identity to your online opinions.
burnerEmailPage.use7P: Software developers and testers constantly need fresh email addresses to test registration flows, verification systems, and notification features. Burner emails provide unlimited addresses on demand.
burnerEmailPage.ben1: Privacy Protection: Your real email stays hidden. No one can trace a burner email back to you.
burnerEmailPage.ben2: Spam Prevention: All spam goes to the burner address, keeping your real inbox clean forever.
burnerEmailPage.ben3: Data Breach Safety: If the service you signed up for gets hacked, your real email won't be on their leaked user list.
burnerEmailPage.ben4: No Account Management: No passwords to remember. No additional accounts to maintain. No login credentials to protect.
burnerEmailPage.ben5: Instant & Free: No registration needed. No cost. Just visit, generate, and use.
burnerEmailPage.vsTitle: Burner Email vs. Regular Email vs. Alias Email
burnerEmailPage.vsP1: Regular Email (Gmail, Outlook): Permanent, tied to your identity, used for long-term communication. Vulnerable to spam and data breaches.
burnerEmailPage.vsP2: Email Aliases (+tags, dots): Variations of your real email that still deliver to your inbox. Useful for organization but don't hide your real address.
burnerEmailPage.vsP3: Burner Email (Fire Temp Mail): Completely separate from your real identity. Temporary, anonymous, auto-deleting. Best for privacy and one-time use.

about.metaTitle: About Fire Temp Mail - Our Mission & Story
about.metaDescription: Learn about Fire Temp Mail ‚Äî a free temporary email service protecting your privacy online. Our mission and values.
about.title: About Fire Temp Mail
about.subtitle: Protecting your digital privacy, one temporary email at a time
about.missionP1: Fire Temp Mail was created to solve a simple but critical problem: the erosion of online privacy. Every day, millions of people are forced to provide their personal email addresses to access services, sign up for trials, or download resources‚Äîoften resulting in an inbox flooded with spam and unwanted marketing emails.
about.missionP2: We believe your email address is personal. You shouldn't have to sacrifice your privacy or compromise your inbox security just to access online services. That's why we built Fire Temp Mail: a completely free, no-registration temporary email service that puts your privacy first.
about.whatWeDoP1: Fire Temp Mail provides instant, anonymous, disposable email addresses that anyone can use‚Äîno registration required. Whether you need a temporary email for a one-time signup, to avoid newsletter spam, or to protect your real identity online, we've got you covered.
about.whatWeDo1: Instant email generation ‚Äî just visit and get a working email address
about.whatWeDo2: Real-time inbox ‚Äî receive emails instantly in your browser
about.whatWeDo3: Multiple domains ‚Äî choose from several available email domains
about.whatWeDo4: Custom aliases ‚Äî create personalized temporary addresses
about.whatWeDo5: Gmail-style addresses ‚Äî get temporary Gmail-like addresses
about.whatWeDo6: Auto-deletion ‚Äî emails are automatically cleaned up for full privacy
about.whyP1: In a world where data breaches, spam, and unsolicited marketing are everyday problems, Fire Temp Mail offers a simple yet powerful solution. We're built by privacy advocates who understand the importance of keeping personal information safe.
about.why1: Free forever ‚Äî no hidden costs, subscriptions, or premium gating
about.why2: No registration ‚Äî start using instantly, no account needed
about.why3: Privacy first ‚Äî we don't track, sell, or monetize your data
about.why4: Open and transparent ‚Äî straightforward service with no tricks
about.why5: Fast and reliable ‚Äî built on modern infrastructure for speed
about.value1Text: We believe privacy is a fundamental right. Our service is designed from the ground up to protect yours.
about.value2Text: Getting a temporary email should be effortless. Visit our site, get an email, use it. That's it.
about.value3Text: No hidden agendas. We're upfront about how our service works and how we sustain it.
about.value4Text: Everyone deserves privacy. That's why Fire Temp Mail is free for everyone, everywhere.
about.futureP1: We're constantly improving Fire Temp Mail to serve our users better. Our roadmap includes enhanced security features, more domain options, improved mobile experience, and additional tools to protect your digital privacy.
about.futureP2: Thank you for trusting Fire Temp Mail with your online privacy. Together, we're building a safer, more private internet‚Äîone temporary email at a time.
about.contactP1: Have questions, feedback, or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you.
